query:
-- 創建 alert_subscriptions 表（用戶的警報訂閱）
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_subscriptions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  subscription_type ENUM('address', 'market', 'category') NOT NULL,
  target_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '目標 ID（地址 ID、市場 ID 或類別名稱）',
  target_name VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '目標名稱（用於顯示）',
  alert_types JSON NOT NULL COMMENT '警報類型列表 ["suspicious_trade", "large_trade", "price_spike"]',
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_subscription_type (subscription_type),
  INDEX idx_target_id (target_id),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_subscription (user_id, subscription_type, target_id)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute -- 創建 alert_subscriptions 表（用戶的警報訂閱）
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_subscriptions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  subscription_type ENUM('address', 'market', 'category') NOT NULL,
  target_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '目標 ID（地址 ID、市場 ID 或類別名稱）',
  target_name VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '目標名稱（用於顯示）',
  alert_types JSON NOT NULL COMMENT '警報類型列表 ["suspicious_trade", "large_trade", "price_spike"]',
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_subscription_type (subscription_type),
  INDEX idx_target_id (target_id),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_subscription (user_id, subscription_type, target_id)
)
